001
002package io.vrap.rmf.base.client.http;
003
004import java.util.ArrayList;
005import java.util.Arrays;
006import java.util.List;
007import java.util.concurrent.CompletableFuture;
008import java.util.function.Function;
009
010import io.vrap.rmf.base.client.ApiHttpRequest;
011import io.vrap.rmf.base.client.ApiHttpResponse;
012import io.vrap.rmf.base.client.AutoCloseableService;
013
014/**
015 * The HandlerStack is used to execute the middlewares in order and transfer the request using the specified {@link HttpHandler}
016 */
017public class HandlerStack extends AutoCloseableService {
018    private final HttpHandler handler;
019
020    private final List<Middleware> middlewares;
021
022    private Function<ApiHttpRequest, CompletableFuture<ApiHttpResponse<byte[]>>> cached;
023
024    private HandlerStack(final HttpHandler handler, final List<Middleware> middlewares) {
025        this.handler = handler;
026        this.middlewares = middlewares;
027        this.cached = null;
028    }
029
030    public static HandlerStack create(final HttpHandler handler, final List<Middleware> middlewares) {
031        return new HandlerStack(handler, middlewares);
032    }
033
034    public static HandlerStack create(final HttpHandler handler) {
035        return create(handler, new ArrayList<>());
036    }
037
038    public void addMiddleware(final Middleware middleware) {
039        this.middlewares.add(middleware);
040        this.cached = null;
041    }
042
043    public void addMiddlewares(final List<Middleware> middlewares) {
044        this.middlewares.addAll(middlewares);
045        this.cached = null;
046    }
047
048    public void addMiddlewares(final Middleware... middlewares) {
049        this.middlewares.addAll(Arrays.asList(middlewares));
050        this.cached = null;
051    }
052
053    Function<ApiHttpRequest, CompletableFuture<ApiHttpResponse<byte[]>>> resolve() {
054        if (cached == null) {
055            List<Middleware> stack = new ArrayList<>(middlewares);
056
057            Function<ApiHttpRequest, CompletableFuture<ApiHttpResponse<byte[]>>> prev = handler::execute;
058
059            for (Middleware middleware : stack) {
060                Function<ApiHttpRequest, CompletableFuture<ApiHttpResponse<byte[]>>> finalPrev = prev;
061                prev = (request) -> middleware.invoke(request, finalPrev);
062            }
063
064            cached = prev;
065        }
066
067        return cached;
068    }
069
070    public CompletableFuture<ApiHttpResponse<byte[]>> invoke(final ApiHttpRequest request) {
071        final Function<ApiHttpRequest, CompletableFuture<ApiHttpResponse<byte[]>>> handler = resolve();
072
073        return handler.apply(request);
074    }
075
076    @Override
077    protected void internalClose() {
078        handler.close();
079        middlewares.forEach(middleware -> {
080            if (middleware instanceof AutoCloseable) {
081                closeQuietly((AutoCloseable) middleware);
082            }
083        });
084    }
085}
